Text:
Papiertiger, (in the name of many I am sure) I  too thank you for your amazing work!
Please please keep it up!
Thank you very much!

I went to d/l the original version, but was suprised to see that they have a weird page viewer.
Those programming dorks at spiegel should be sent to Siberia!

I found a tiny link on the oveview page 
'Zum alten E-Paper'

http://wissen.spiegel.de/wissen/epaper/SP/2013/13/start.html

What's next?
If they stop offering this as pdf in future, I for my part will cancel them.
